comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...

comment._content: Billy Sunday straddles two themes of the Bain Collection : Baseballers and religious figures. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Billy_Sunday Mrs. Sunday, the former Helen Amelia "Nell" Thompson, was perhaps the organizational power behind Mr. Sunday's success as a Christian Evangelist.
